Mechanical_Twist: Heavy/Light: Jump distance tripled OR movement speed halved. Knockback is doubled.
Lag: Actions resolve at the end of the round not on the player's turn.
Hyper-Reflex: All participants have +2 Initiative and +10ft movement.
Phase-Shift: Walls/Cover act as difficult terrain (permeable) instead of solid obstacles.
Overgrowth: Healing is maxed but vines grow on the target (Grappled condition).
Superheat: Metal armor deals 1d4 fire damage to the wearer each round.
Wild Magic: Any spell cast triggers a random side effect (visual or auditory).
Grid-Lock: No curves. Movement and range must be in straight lines/right angles only.
Prism: No stealth possible. Invisible creatures are revealed. Illusions are solid.
Rot: A critical fail breaks a weapon. Potions spoil if not used immediately.
Empathy: Damage is linked. Dealing damage causes the attacker to take 1 Psychic damage.
The Rule: A law appears (e.g. "No Metal"). Breaking it causes 2d6 damage.
Double Trouble: Roll twice on this table and apply both effects.
Silence: No Magic or Aether-Tech functions here. Mundane gear only.
Power-Up: All Spells/Attacks deal double damage but cost double resources.
Time Skip: Every 1d4 rounds the combat resets to the positions of the previous round.
Paranoia: Players cannot see each other's health/status. Communication is garbled.
Physics Failure: Up is Down. Ranged attacks hit random targets. Chaos reigns.
Perfect Calm: No Chaos effects. Magic is stable. A rare moment of peace.
Catastrophe: A massive explosion or warp event occurs in 1d4 rounds. Escape is the only goal.
